text: The Algeria national athletics team represents Algeria at the international athletics competitions such as Olympic Games or World Athletics Championships. ==Medal count== Algeria has 13 participations in the Summer Olympic of 27 editions held from 1896 to 2016. {| class="wikitable" width=40% style="font- size:90%; text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 | Competition ! colspan=5 | Medal
